intro: Stylidium pycnostachyum, commonly known as the dense-stemmed sun-orchid, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae and is characterized by its unique, compact growth habit. The plant produces small, brightly colored flowers that are often yellow or orange, attracting various pollinators. It typically grows in sandy or rocky soils in arid or semi-arid regions. Stylidium pycnostachyum is known for its ability to thrive in harsh environmental conditions.
